pullRequest.title: Support in and notIn in ResidualVisitor

commit.message: Support in and notIn in ResidualVisitor

nodes.bodyText: The literal set can handle all types, so this can use contains instead of checking each value individually.
Can you also add cases to testUnpartitionedResiduals?

Can you also add tests for in and notIn with a timestamp (ts column) to date transform (day)?
For the in case, the residual for a date that contains one of the timestamps should be the original in predicate. If the date doesn't match one of the in predicate timestamp values, then it should be alwaysFalse. For notIn, if the date matches it should be the original notIn predicate and if it does not match, it should be alwaysTrue.

commit.message: address the comments and add additional unit tests

nodes.bodyText: Nit: This doesn't require a newline.
